title: Lorenz Fischl
text:
I graduated at the Technical University Vienna, where I majored in technical mathematics.
 My work experience includes the University, CERN and MedAustron.
 My academic and professional work has centered on various parts of the data workflow in cutting edge accelerator facilities. I contributed to the data collection, management, analysis and controll of particle accelerators.
 I am a strong advocate for collaboration via open-source. I believe in the collective intelligence and strive to contribute to a whole that is greater than its parts.
